# MFÂ² Stack - Frontend

The modern web starter with Next.js, TypeScript, and Tailwind CSS. Build beautiful, fast websites in minutes.

## Overview

MFÂ² Stack (Move F***ing Fast Stack) Frontend is a production-ready starter template that combines the best modern web technologies for building stunning, performant websites and web applications.

## Tech Stack

- **Next.js 15** - React framework with App Router
- **TypeScript** - Type safety throughout
- **Tailwind CSS** - Utility-first styling  
- **shadcn/ui** - Beautiful, accessible components
- **Framer Motion** - Smooth animations
- **Vercel** - Deployment and analytics

## Features

- ğŸ¨ Beautiful UI with shadcn/ui and Tailwind
- ğŸŒ™ Dark mode support
- ğŸ“± Fully responsive design
- ğŸš€ Lightning fast with Turbopack
- ğŸ“Š Analytics with Vercel
- ğŸ” SEO optimized with metadata API
- ğŸ“¦ Bundle analyzer included
- âš¡ Zero configuration needed

## Getting Started

```bash
npx startdown@latest
```

Select "No, just frontend" when prompted about backend needs.

## Documentation

Full documentation available at https://mf2stack.dev/docs
